attributes.additional_details:
This is a cross-Anglo sphere petition to energise the masses to reverse the egregious decision to terminate the literary services of the Powerhouse: Ryan Clements.

We ask that David Cameron, Her Majesty's First Minister, use whatever power still resides in his office, to grease polls and pull strings, to reinstall Ryan. Please Dave, the world is a poorer, less luminous bauble absent his presence at IGN.
